name: Djinguereber Mosque
description: A UNESCO World Heritage site, this mosque is a stunning example of traditional Malian architecture.

name: Sankore Mosque
description: This mosque was a center of learning in the 14th century and is known for its historical significance.

name: Tomb of Askia
description: A mausoleum that showcases the rich history of the Songhai Empire.

name: Niger River
description: A vital waterway that has supported the region's economy and culture for centuries.

name: Festival au Désert
description: An annual music festival that celebrates the cultural heritage of the region.

name: Timbuktu Manuscripts
description: A collection of ancient manuscripts that provide insight into the history and culture of the region.

name: Maison des Esclaves
description: A historical site that reflects the region's past and its role in the trans-Saharan slave trade.

name: Ksar of Timbuktu
description: A collection of ancient buildings that represent the architectural heritage of Timbuktu.
